channel.title: Creative commons license: permission to use assets.
channel.description:
Hello BMS team,
I did post this question [url='https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showpost.php?p=494019&postcount=195']here[/url], but it seems its just going to get lost in amongst the other questions.
I belong to a smaller mod which some of you may have heard of "The Darkmod" (TDM). While playing BMS I observed the odd ambient sound or dirty texture that would work well with TDM.
As BMS was created with CC licence, I would humbly like to ask for permission for my team/mod to use a small amount of the aforementioned sounds/textures.
kind regards
Bikerdude

item.description:
Hello BMS team,
